committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Harriet Taylor Upton National Historic Site in Warren, Ohio.
short_title: Harriet Taylor Upton National Historic Site Act of 1990

summary.text: Harriet Taylor Upton National Historic Site Act of 1990 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the former residence and certain personal property of Harriet Taylor Upton, an active member of the movement to extend suffrage to women. Designates such residence as the Harriet Taylor Upton National Historic Site in Warren, Ohio.

titles.title: Harriet Taylor Upton National Historic Site Act of 1990
To establish the Harriet Taylor Upton National Historic Site in Warren, Ohio.
